titleStmt.title: A true account of the horrid conspiracy against the life of His Sacred Majesty William III. King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, &c. setting forth by how it was contrived; how it was to be carried on; and the manner of its discovery. Published by authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Brent at the Hercules-Pillars in Essex-street, for Jacob Milner; and are to be sold at his shop over against the end of Essex-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..

place.placeName: his shop over against the end of Essex-Bridge
